mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST_T (MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, ISLIKED) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, TRUE)
mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_PRICE, PI.STORED_URL, W.MEMBER_ID, P.PRODUCT_ID FROM WISHLIST_T W INNER JOIN PRODUCT_T P ON W.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCT_ID = PI.PRODUCT_ID WHERE W.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
